duties_responsibilities.duty: Manages the day-to-day operation of one section of the clinical or anatomical laboratory.
Has responsibility for the quality and timeliness of testing.
Has responsibility for equipment, supplies, financial management, schedules and personnel management.
Analyzes market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Manages the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in Medical Technology or related fields. NYS Education Department Clinical Laboratory Technologist License or Eligible. Six years progressive experience in laboratory medicine (58-1.5) N.Y.S.
